config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _transientMode configuration determines whether to use a TransientJournal or a PersistentJournal in the journal() method. If _transientMode is true, a TransientJournal is created. If false, a PersistentJournal is created with specific parameters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _transientMode configuration depends on the value set for it. If the value changes during runtime or initialization, the journal() method will be triggered accordingly.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _transientMode configuration option on the system is significant as it determines the type of journal used, which can affect performance, durability, and resource usage.
